title: Pizza surplus exists at price of $10

content.prompt: At a price of $10, the quantity demanded of pizzas is 100 and the quantity supplied is 150. Which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: There is a shortage of pizza at a price of $10.
The equilibrium price of pizza is below $10.
The quantity of pizzas sold will be 150.
At equilibrium, fewer than 100 pizzas will be sold.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
